mn4:20.9: tassa mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa etadahosi → tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ hoti (bj, pts1) | tassa mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃ hoti (s1-3)
mn4:20.13: tathābhūtaṃ tathābhūtova → tathābhūta­tathā­bhūto va (bj) | tathābhūto tathābhūtova (s1-3), yathābhūtaṃ yathābhūtassa → yathā­bhūta­yathā­bhūtassa (bj) | yathābhūtassa yathābhūtassa (s1-3)
